title: Brand Ult R is bugged
body:
Just played a game as Brand vs. a Corki mid. Somehow though, my ult continuously would not bounce. I used it 3 times in a row (with the target being Corki) and all of those times my ult would not bounce to any targets. All 3 times Corki was in a group of minions so there were definitely targets for the Brand ult to choose. Later on, I would use my ult on other targets and it would work perfectly fine and I wouldn't use it on Corki again as I didn't want the bug to mess me up again. While this bug isn't big, it's still game breaking in a matchup like this and should certainly be looked into.

Thank you for your time.

replies.body: My friend watched a Kassadin constantly make the ult going into oblivion, so maybe you are onto something bigger with brand

"Brand's R - Pyroclasm no longer forgets to bounce to minions if cast on an Ablaze enemy champion with no other nearby enemy champions"

It should be fixed in the next [patch](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-63-notes#patch-bugfixes).
